text: Duca duha ibisigi abantu baboneka yuko batishoboye kandi babonerwa twahaye ibisigi vy’ibisagara vyo mubuseruko no mubumanuko bw’igihugu arivyo twashizemwo imihezagiro myinshi, n’ijambo ryiza ry’Umuremyi wawe riba ariryo ritsimbatara kuri bene Israeri kubera ukwihangana kwabo, n’uguca duhonya ivyo Fir’auni yahora agira hamwe n’abantu biwe, hamwe n’ivyo bahora bubaka
